BriefcaseAssignment.name: BriefcaseAssignment
BriefcaseAssignment.description: Represents the assignment of a briefcase definition to selected users and user groups.

BriefcaseId.description: Required. ID of the briefcase definition. Label is Briefcase Definition ID.

UserOrGroupId.description: Required. ID of the user or group requiring access to the briefcase. Label is User or Group ID.
